title: 'Thus terms are represented ...'  should be 'Thus fields are represented ...'
description:
In the last paragraph of http://lucene.apache.org/java/3_1_0/fileformats.html#Definitions, second sentance, it says:

       Thus terms are represented as a pair of 
       strings, the first naming the field, and 
       the second naming text within the field. 

Shouldn't it start "Thus fields are ..."  ?

comments.content: I think it's correct as-is?  Ie, a term is two strings (field, text).
comments.author: Michael McCandless
